name: HellTrench
description:
By Dreadusa, Mangneto, Mortistar, and Comfysaur.


Venture into the deep to discover ancient secrets and precious treasure, while defending yourself from the dangers inside the Helltrench.

Features:
7 levels (including a boss)
2 Worlds
A boss
Weapon upgrades
Ship stat upgrades
and more!

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR LUDUM DARE, YOU CAN RATE IT HERE:
 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/helltrench
